Champions League
OL: Bertrand TraorÃ© burglarized!
During the meeting between OL and Benfica, yesterday in the Champions League, Bertrand Traore was robbed.
06 Nov 2019, 07:20 by Hugo Deloraine



There are times when everything goes wrong or almost. Group Bertrand Stadium, who was often heckled by Groupama Stadium fans in Lyon, thought he had a good night yesterday after scoring Lyon's third goal in OL's win over Benfica (3-1)! Yet, at the final whistle, he learned bad news.




Burgled during the meeting




OL + 11 ğŸ“·Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Indeed, just minutes after the final whistle, the BurkinabÃ© international quickly came down from his little cloud on hearing that he had been burgled during the meeting, in his house located in Chassieu. When it does not, it does not want to!
